EMAIL_ALREADY_SEND: Email with your token already send (eventually, look in your span).
EMAIL_BAD: Email not accepted by the system.
EMAIL_TOKEN_CRASH: Error on sending email with the token.
EMAIL_NOT_VALID: Invalid email, please verify your entry.
REGISTER_ALREADY: You are already registered, please sign in...
REGISTRATION_TO_VALIDATE: Email for the account validation sent.
REGISTER_ADMIN_CONTACT: There is a problem with your registration, please contact the Adminstrator of the site.
FORGOT_PWD_EMAIL_SENT: Email send with the link to create a new password.
FORGOT_PWD_EMAIL_NOT_SENT: We could not send the Email send with the link to create a new password. Try again.
ACCOUNT_TO_VALIDATE: The Account still need to be validated.
